zh: 好像没几个人能解开那道数学题。

en: Have you figured out the math problem yet?
zh: 那道数学题你算出来了吗？

en: The math homework proved to be easier than I had expected.
zh: 数学作业比我想象的要简单。

en: Have you learned the number by heart?
zh: 那个号码你背下来了吗？

en: The drunken man awoke to find himself in prison.
zh: 那个醉汉醒来发现自己竟然在监狱里。

en: The drunken man couldn't walk straight.
zh: 那个醉汉走路都走不稳。

en: The drunkard had too much to drink; he has gone haywire.
zh: 那个醉鬼喝多了，开始胡来了。

en: The decline can be traced to the 1950s.
zh: 这种衰退可以追溯到20世纪50年代。

en: The swimming pool is used in common by all the children in the neighborhood.
zh: 附近的各种小孩都共用这个游泳池。

en: The water was fouled by oil.
zh: 水被油给弄脏了。

en: The water runs downward to the pond.
zh: 水顺流而下进了池塘。

en: The water is not fit to drink.
zh: 这水不能喝。

en: The water will come to a boil in 5 minutes or so.
zh: 水大概五分钟左右就能烧开。

en: The mystery contains more dialogue than narrative.
zh: 这本推理小说里的对话比叙述多。

en: The figures are exactly alike.
zh: 这些数字完全一模一样。

en: The library has many books.
zh: 图书馆有很多书。

en: The library is now under construction.
zh: 图书馆现在正在施工呢。

en: The library is eighty years old.
zh: 这个图书馆有八十年的历史了。

en: The chart illustrates how the body works.
zh: 这张图表展示了身体运作的方式。

en: The anthropologist delivered a lecture on primitive cultures.
zh: 那个人类学家做了一个关于原始文化的讲座。

en: They are both working at the pet store.
zh: 他们俩都在宠物店工作。

en: They should have bold ideas.
zh: 他们应该有点大胆的想法。

en: The men were carrying the boy to the hospital.
zh: 那些男人正抬着那个男孩去医院。

en: They should also be fair to others.
zh: 他们对别人也应该公平点。

en: The people are playing baseball.
zh: 那些人在打棒球。

en: The people tried to clear the street of snow.
zh: 那些人正试着清理街上的积雪。

en: The people don't like the birds.
zh: 人们不喜欢这些鸟。

en: The people resisted their cruel ruler.
zh: 人民反抗了残暴的统治者。

en: The doll lay on the floor.
zh: 洋娃娃躺在地板上。

en: Covered with dust, the doll stood in the corner of the room.
zh: 那个洋娃娃落满了灰，丢在房间角落里。

en: The popular singer committed suicide.
zh: 那个当红歌手自杀了。

en: That popular television series is going to spin off two new shows in the fall.
zh: 那部火爆的电视剧秋天要出两部衍生剧。

en: The man wrote down the name for fear he should forget it.
zh: 那个男的把名字记了下来，怕给忘了。

en: The man passed by without so much as glancing at her.
zh: 那个男的从她身边走过，看都没看她一眼。

en: Is the man old or young?
zh: 那个男的是老的还是年轻的？

en: The man is intelligent and industrious.
zh: 那人既聪明又勤快。

en: The man must have succeeded in business by virtue of his efforts.
zh: 那男的生意能成功，肯定是靠他自己的努力。

en: The man is well-known all over the village.
zh: 那个人在村里很有名。

en: The man died a few hours ago.
zh: 那男的几小时前去世了。

en: He was kind enough to take him to the shop.
zh: 他人挺好的，还带他去了那家店。

en: They would think the person is modest or lazy.
zh: 他们会觉得那个人要么是谦虚，要么是懒。

en: The man tried to catch hold of me by the collar.
zh: 那个男的想揪我领子。

en: The man jumped at our offer of a half-price bargain sale.
zh: 那个男的一听说打五折就赶紧答应了。

en: The man is all but dead.
zh: 那个男的快不行了。

en: The man was dying.
zh: 那个男的快要死了。

en: The man went out of his way to take me to the station.
zh: 那个男的特意把我送到了车站。

en: The man was surprised at the news.
zh: 那个男的听到这个消息很吃惊。

en: The man is not concerned in this project.
zh: 那个男的没参与这个项目。

en: The man died of cancer.
zh: 那个男的是得癌症死的。

en: Did he look like a doctor?
zh: 他看起来像个医生吗？

en: The man extricated Ellie from a dangerous situation.
zh: 那男的把艾莉从险境中救了出来。

en: His name eludes me.
zh: 我想不起他的名字了。

en: Can their families say this for them? Some people think this is a good idea.
zh: 他们的家人能替他们这么说吗？有些人觉得这是个好主意。

en: What he said was over my head.
zh: 他说的话我听不懂。

en: A man may be known by the company he keeps.
zh: 看一个人交什么朋友就知道他是什么样的人。

en: You can't judge a person if you don't know him well.
zh: 你不了解一个人就没法评判他。

en: You cannot judge a person if you don't know him well.
zh: 你不了解一个人就没法评判他。

en: I once met him when I was a student.
zh: 我当学生那会儿见过他一次。

en: You ought not to speak ill of others behind their backs.
zh: 你不应该在背后说人坏话。

en: The man would jump at our offer of a half price bargain sale.
zh: 那个男的肯定会迫不及待地接受打五折的提议。

en: I met him once when I was a student.
zh: 我当学生的时候见过他一次。

en: How did you get to know that person?
zh: 你是怎么认识那个人的？

en: They are just waiting for the storm to pass.
zh: 他们只是在等暴风雨过去。

en: Those people appreciate clarity.
zh: 那些人喜欢清清楚楚的。

en: The people are on the team.
zh: 那些人都在队里。

en: They should have a noble mind.
zh: 他们应该具备高尚的品质。

en: They are satisfied with the contract.
zh: 他们对合同很满意。

en: The man behind them is playing the piano.
zh: 他们身后那男的在弹钢琴。

en: They are having a chat.
zh: 他们在聊天。

en: I quite cottoned on to that man.
zh: 我总算搞懂那个人了。

en: You don't fall in love with somebody because he's perfect.
zh: 你爱上一个人并不是因为他完美。

en: The gentleman is a very famous pianist.
zh: 那位先生是一位非常有名的钢琴家。

en: Tell me what the gentleman is like.
zh: 告诉我那位先生人怎么样。

en: I remember seeing the gentleman before.
zh: 我记得以前见过那位先生。

en: The myth offers insights into the ancient civilization.
zh: 那个神话有助于我们了解古文明。

en: The shrine was built two hundred years ago.
zh: 这座神庙是两百年前建的。

en: The decay of the shrine is due, in part, to acid rain.
zh: 神庙的损坏一部分是因为酸雨。
